roleset.name: perform a transaction
roleset.note: TRANSACT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'transact' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. This is a stupid, stupid, stupid verb backformed from 'transaction'. (from transact.01-v predicate notes)
TRANSACTION-N NOTES: Roleset based on transact.01. No corresponding verbnet class. Framed by Katie (from transaction.01-n)

example.name: see what I mean?
example.text: The current opportunities arise because the process for executing a buy or sell order in the actual stocks that make up the S& P 500 is more cumbersome than *trace* transacting in the futures market.

example.name: with transaction
example.text: [W.N. Whelen& Co., of Georgetown, Del., and its president, William N. Whelen Jr., also of Georgetown,]-1 were barred [*-1] -2 from [*-2] transacting principal trades for 90 days and were jointly fined $15,000.

example.name: Arg 1 as a kind of transaction
Adj where arg 1 may be tempted
Example with arg 0 and arg 2
example.text: The first RTC transaction with a foreign bank
